oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The World of Organic Agriculture: Statistics and Future Prospects 2003
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study documents concisely recent developments in global organic agriculture. Apart from figures on the area under organic management and on organic farms this publication also contains general information on the state of organic agriculture in the five continents.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), DE-Tholey-Theley
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Yussefi, Minou and Willer, Helga (Eds.) (2003) The World of Organic Agriculture: Statistics and Future Prospects 2003. International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), DE-Tholey-Theley.
